languages.text: {n}Ульфар строго и по-деловому уточняет:{/n} "Подношения охотничьей добычи? Охранные обереги на тропах?" {n}Получив утвердительный ответ, он солидно и удовлетворенно кивает.{/n}
{n}In a stern, brusque manner, Ulfar asks with interest,{/n} "Offerings of game? Protective amulets on the trails?" {n}After receiving an affirmative answer, he gives a firm and satisfied nod.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ульфар строго и по-деловому уточняет:{/n} "Подношения охотничьей добычи? Охранные обереги на тропах?" {n}Получив утвердительный ответ, он солидно и удовлетворенно кивает.{/n}

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}嵐の中、ウルファーは素っ気ない態度だが興味をもって尋ねる。{/n}「捧げる獲物は？道中を保護するアミュレットは？」{n}肯定的な答えが返ってくると、ウルファーは自信を持って満足げにうなずく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a stern, brusque manner, Ulfar asks with interest,{/n} "Offerings of game? Protective amulets on the trails?" {n}After receiving an affirmative answer, he gives a firm and satisfied nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}嵐の中、ウルファーは素っ気ない態度だが興味をもって尋ねる。{/n}「捧げる獲物は？道中を保護するアミュレットは？」{n}肯定的な答えが返ってくると、ウルファーは自信を持って満足げにうなずく。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法以严厉而粗鲁的态度，饶有兴趣地开口询问。{/n}“会献上猎物吗？会在林间小路旁挂上护身符吗？”{n}得到肯定的回答后，他带着满意的神色，重重地点了点头。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a stern, brusque manner, Ulfar asks with interest,{/n} "Offerings of game? Protective amulets on the trails?" {n}After receiving an affirmative answer, he gives a firm and satisfied nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法以严厉而粗鲁的态度，饶有兴趣地开口询问。{/n}“会献上猎物吗？会在林间小路上挂护身符？”{n}得到肯定的回答后，他带着满意的深色，重重地点了点头。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}D'un ton brusque et austère, Ulfar demande avec grand intérêt :{/n} « Des offrandes de gibier ? Des amulettes de protection sur les sentiers ? » {n}Après avoir obtenu une réponse affirmative, il hoche fermement la tête en signe de satisfaction.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a stern, brusque manner, Ulfar asks with interest,{/n} "Offerings of game? Protective amulets on the trails?" {n}After receiving an affirmative answer, he gives a firm and satisfied nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}D'un ton brusque et austère, Ulfar demande avec grand intérêt :{/n} « Des offrandes de gibier ? Des amulettes de protection sur les sentiers ? » {n}Après avoir obtenu une réponse affirmative, il hoche fermement la tête en signe de satisfaction.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, seria y bruscamente, pregunta con interés:{/n} «¿Ofrendas de caza? ¿Amuletos en el camino?». {n}Tras recibir una respuesta afirmativa, hace un gesto firme y satisfecho con la cabeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a stern, brusque manner, Ulfar asks with interest,{/n} "Offerings of game? Protective amulets on the trails?" {n}After receiving an affirmative answer, he gives a firm and satisfied nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar, seria y bruscamente, pregunta con interés:{/n} «¿Ofrendas de caza? ¿Amuletos en el camino?». {n}Tras recibir una respuesta afirmativa, hace un gesto firme y satisfecho con la cabeza.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Mit seiner barschen Art fragt Ulfar interessiert:{/n} "Geopfertes Wildbret? Schutzamulette auf den Pfaden?" {n}Nach einer bestätigenden Antwort nickt er ernst und zufrieden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a stern, brusque manner, Ulfar asks with interest,{/n} "Offerings of game? Protective amulets on the trails?" {n}After receiving an affirmative answer, he gives a firm and satisfied nod.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit seiner barschen Art fragt Ulfar interessiert:{/n} "Geopfertes Wildbret? Schutzamulette auf den Pfaden?" {n}Nach einer bestätigenden Antwort nickt er ernst und zufrieden.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sert ve nezaketsiz bir tutum takınan Ulfar, ilgiyle sorusunu yöneltiyor.{/n} "Av adakları mı veriliyor? Yollarda koruyucu uğurluklar mı eşlik ediyor?" {n}Onaylayan bir yanıt almasının ardından kararlı ve memnun bir şekilde başını sallıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}In a stern, brusque manner, Ulfar asks with interest,{/n} "Offerings of game? Protective amulets on the trails?" {n}After receiving an affirmative answer, he gives a firm and satisfied nod.{/n}
